name: Smart HR
description: A cloud-based Human Resource Management System (HRMS)
There are total 3 signup routes in this website - Employee, HR and Admin.
After logging in, an employee can add daily tasks to his dashboard and view his payment history.
HR will be able to view the progress of all employees, verify employees and make their payments on its dashboard.
Admin can view all employees in his dashboard and update their salary, convert employees to HR and also can see all the messages.

name: Men Beauty Parlour
description: Beauty salon for every men
On this website customer or user can make his desired service appointment with date, time, phone number and later pay it on his dashboard.
Users also have the opportunity to review.
In admin dashboard, admin can view all login users and convert any user to admin. Also can add new services.

name: Radar Weather
description: A weather forecasting website
You can search the weather of different countries or cities and see the weather forecast for the next 5 days and also toggle the weather of different countries in Celsius and Fahrenheit.

You can list your favorite country or city separately. However, you cannot add a country or city to the favorite list more than once. If you want, you can delete the country or city of the favorite list.

name: Royella
description: Hotel room booking website
Here you can book the available room by specifying the date and update it later.
You can give your important opinion in the room booked.
Also there is an option to filter the price of the rooms.

name: Khairah Charity
description: Go for help - A donation based website
Here you can donate to several projects. However, you must login to donate.
While donating you will submit your name, phone number, message. Later it will be added to your donation section.
The donation form given earlier is approved and later it has to be paid.

name: Simple Calculator
description: A simple calculator
